generatedNote: This is a human-maintained capabilities catalog for the Web runtime. Keep it aligned with src/web/Project/react-vite implementation and VAULT_WEB_ROUTES/VAULT_WORKFLOW_PHASES.

capabilities.name: Landing
capabilities.description: Centered hero + symbolic silhouette; entrypoint to claim flow and VBIO deep link.

capabilities.description: Wizard shell with phase routing, progress bar, and navigation controls.

capabilities.name: Results
capabilities.description: Results view for the claim workflow outputs.

capabilities.name: Tools Suite
capabilities.description: Utilities like Buddy Statement Generator and Service Timeline Builder.

capabilities.name: VBIO

capabilities.name: Mission
capabilities.description: Mission selection + VA processing time estimate and timeline transparency.

capabilities.name: Identity
capabilities.description: Blue Button upload + auto-fill; POA/VSO selection; Battle Buddy mode; audit trail updates.

capabilities.name: Conditions
capabilities.description: Interactive body map with intent levels; auto-selects related body systems.

capabilities.name: Narrative
capabilities.description: Narrative builder + deterministic suggestions (Mind Reader + Pattern Predictor).

capabilities.name: Review
capabilities.description: Review + evidence intake including on-device OCR processing.

capabilities.name: Local persistence (Zustand)
capabilities.description: Claim progress persists locally; includes versioned migrations to prevent crashes.

capabilities.name: PWA/offline support (React)
capabilities.description: Vite PWA integration for offline caching in the React/Vite app.

capabilities.name: Local-first posture
capabilities.description: No required accounts; on-device processing and persistence by default.
